Record.ClassificationPath: Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Bacterial Infections/Gram-Negative Bacterial Infections/Chlamydiaceae Infections/Chlamydophila Infections/Psittacosis
Record.Description: Infection with CHLAMYDOPHILA PSITTACI (formerly Chlamydia psittaci), transmitted to humans by inhalation of dust-borne contaminated nasal secretions or excreta of infected BIRDS. This infection results in a febrile illness characterized by PNEUMONITIS and systemic manifestations.
